Written in React using Express and MongoDB"}, {"title":"COVID-19 Variant Analysis", "description":"Bash - GATK - BWA - NextClade - Pangolin"}, {"title":"Type 1 Diabietes Three Country Cohort Analysis", "description":"R - Kraken - Bracken - Krona - Phyloseq - AmpVis"}, {"title":">Personal Portfolio<", "description":"Designed in Cinema 4d, Illustrator and Figma. Written in React using Express and MongoDB"}, ] } return ( <>
